projects.title: Wireless Display Module
projects.summary: The solution of the Display Module reflects my expertise in both hardware and software engineering, and it encapsulates my commitment to crafting efficient and practical innovations...

projects.title: 3.5 DoF Robotic Arm
projects.summary: Took on the control engineering lead in a 3 person team designing a robotic arm with 3.5 degrees of freedom. I designed and fine-tuned a PID controller algorithm using MATLAB & Simulink and ported the algorithm to C for programming a microcontroller to control the robot...

projects.title: Digital IoT Parking Sign
projects.summary: Created an innovative digital parking sign that dynamically adjusts its display based on real-time data. This sign can receive updates from a web-application or by an hourly schedule and respond to feedback from sensors...

projects.title: ATM Integrated Chip Design
projects.summary: Created an Automated Teller Machine (ATM) using a Finite State Machine (FSM) and then designed an integrated chip at the transistor level. I designed the ATM ensuring it could perform key functions such as balance checking and withdrawals...

projects.title: Puzzle Game iOS Application
projects.summary: Designed and developed an iOS puzzle game from scratch. The game was designed using Xcode and Swift and it incorporated an algorithm to generate an endless variety of unique and solvable puzzles...
